blog.description:

☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Any fin is possible
description:
by Caligula27

The tribe of the white sharks and the tribe of the mermaids/mermen has been fighting a war that broke out decades ago, when the sharks started feeding on the mermaids’ sacred fish. Kirishima Eijirou who essentially has no connection to the cause of the war has been kidnapped by the mermaids and Bakugou Katsuki, who due to an injury isn’t capable of fighting has been assigned the job of looking out for the prisoner.

Words: 1406, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Kaminari Denki, Yaoyorozu Momo, Jirou Kyouka
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Minor or Background Relationship(s), Bakugou Katsuki & Jirou Kyouka
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Merpeople, Kidnapping, War, yes the title is a bad pun

tags: i hate to say it but....y'all ain't as creative as you guys think you are
out of all the fics i read; only ONE fic did exactly as i listed
summary: been reading some villain!izuku fics where he’s either raised by the LoV or willingly joins and y’all are really out there...
body:
been reading some villain!izuku fics where he’s either raised by the LoV or willingly joins and y’all are really out there thinking izuku wouldn’t change his name or appearance, huh?

literally EVERY villain in the league goes by a different name and y’all think izuku wouldn’t do the same? pretty much every villain!izuku fic has him listed as a missing person and you guys think the LoV wouldn’t be aware of that and fucking change his name and appearance?

just changing his family name ain’t gonna do shit if you guys still call him izuku or still make him have green hair and eyes. get creative guys, you can do it. not that hard to fully change his name and change his hair and eye color. kirishima is prime example of this, he used to have black hair and always kept it down. now look at him. hair dye exists in the series so it wouldn’t be too hard for them to get their hands on it and even give him a new haircut.

just changing his family name ain’t gonna do shit if you guys still call him izuku or still make him have green hair and eyes. get creative guys, you can do it. not that hard to fully change his name and change his hair and eye color. kirishima is prime example of this, he used to have black hair and always kept it down. now look at him. hair dye exists in the series so it wouldn’t be too hard for them to get their hands on it and even give him a new haircut.

summary: Finally working on the first chapter of my Shouchako fic! It’s a fantasy au and will be a pretty slow burn romance with some...
body:
Finally working on the first chapter of my Shouchako fic! It’s a fantasy au and will be a pretty slow burn romance with some pretty explicit scenes that could be triggering, but there will be warnings.

I can’t wait to finish the first chapter and publish it! I’ll link the sites I posted it on!

blog.description: commissions are OPEN! art trades are OPEN!

summary: finally got around to drawing my bnha teachersona, Clean Sweep! :D Their Quirk is called Reversal, and they can basically...
caption:
finally got around to drawing my bnha teachersona, Clean Sweep! :D
Their Quirk is called Reversal, and they can basically rebuild/revert anything back to the way it was, up to 24 hours in the past! (it’s possible to go back farther, but it starts to mess with the space-time continuum, so they try not to go any farther than that lol) It can also kind of work on other people, but it’s a little tricky. Their quirk is very helpful in cleanup situations though- hence the name lol~
They came from America to teach at UA for a few semesters (they teach both art, and they oversee courses that help to teach the students how to work in cleanup and rescue situations!), and they also have Very Obvious Crushes on Literally Every Teacher at UA lol

I’ll probably do a proper reference sheet for them eventually, as well as a few other student OCs I have in mind >O> but for now, here’s this lol!
